import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { FormGroup, FormBuilder, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-todo', templateUrl: './todo.component.html', styleUrls: ['./todo.component.scss'], }) export class TodoComponent implements OnInit { todoForm !:FormGroup; tasks:any[]=[]; inprogress:any[]=[]; done:any[]=[]; constructor(private fb:FormBuilder) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.todoForm=this.fb.group({ item:['',Validators.required] }) } }
